title: Your favorite AI tool barely scraped by this safety review - why that's a problem
description: The Future of Life Institute assigned letter grades to eight leading AI labs to score their safety efforts. The results look like the report card of a child who's barely making an effort.
content:
SAIGLOBALNT/iStock / Getty Images Plus Follow ZDNET: Add us as a preferred source on Google. ZDNET's key takeaways
